title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Visitor Center
body: Visitor Center         Visitor Center Russ Bodnar  We are the process of a substantial remodeling of our Visitor Center. The Visitor Center at Chaco Culture National Historical Park is open all year from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. There is a staffed information desk where rangers can help you plan your visit. A video is shown throughout the day in the auditorium. The museum in the Visitor Center features exhibits on the cultural history of Chaco Canyon. Books, videos, postcards, posters, tee-shirts, etc. are available in the Western National Parks Association bookstore within the Visitor Center. The Visitor Center is closed on Christmas, Thanksgiving, and New Years Day.        Visitor Center museum entrance Russ Bodnar        Visitor in museum Tracy Bodnar
